feed.title: Kamal Mandava
feed.subtitle: Graduate Student in Data Science at University of Central Oklahoma. Research focuses on computational modeling of stochastic biological systems, with emphasis on fibrinolysis and nonlinear dynamics.

entry.title: Project Initiation: FibriNet and Mechanistic Modeling

link.title: Project Initiation: FibriNet and Mechanistic Modeling

entry.content: Welcome to my research blog. Here, I will document my progress on the FibriNet project, exploring the intersection of stochastic particle systems and nonlinear mechanical behavior in fibrin networks.
entry.summary: An introduction to my current work in computational biophysics.
